column3: Latest;Australian Christian missionary ------Martin Chan------ has been found not guilty of fraud in Cambodia
column4: bringing an end to a four-year ordeal to clear his name.------Mr Chan stood trial in Cambodia on charges of fraud
column5: relating to a school building project he managed as a volunteer on behalf of a Christian-run organisation
column6: HIS International Services.------But after a lengthy legal dispute
column7: including his arrest and spending three months in a crowded prison cell
column8: the missionary is grateful to be a free man.------“I’m relived to hear the result
column9: ” Mr Chan said.------“I was a bit worried. Sometimes the court is a bit unpredictable here in Cambodia.------FULL STORY: ------ABC NEWS
